channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 9 Fun, Cheap, And Easy-To-Learn Party Card Games For The Holidays
item.description: These cheap, simple, and fun card games will help you find common ground with anyone in your family and friendship circle, whatever their age.

item.title: NYT Connections Hints Today: Sunday, December 21 Clues And Answers (#924)
item.description: Looking for today's NYT Connections hints? Some help and the answers for today's game are right here to help keep your streak alive.

item.title: iOS 26.2: Apple Abruptly Cancels Key iOS 18.7.3 Update For Millions Of iPhone Users
item.description: If you’ve been waiting for iOS 18.7.3 to reach your iPhone, it looks like it’s been scrapped. Here’s what to know.

item.title: Designing Reactive AI With Spiking Neural Nets
item.description: Wolfram-like attention framing meets spiking networks: event-triggered, energy-thrifty AI that “wakes” to stimuli.

item.title: Bottomless

item.title: Our practice

item.title: The thing about chess
item.description: In a typical tournament, you don’t score any extra points for winning with the fewest number of moves. Quickly isn’t the point.

item.title: Filtering ourselves
